item.title: How to get startup ideas?
item.description:
How to get startup ideas?

The way to get startup ideas is not to try to think of startup ideas. It's to look for problems, preferably problems you have yourself. The very best startup ideas tend to have three things in common: they're something the founders themselves want, that they themselves can build, and that few others realize are worth doing. Microsoft, Apple, Yahoo, Google, and Facebook all began this way.

item.title: O'Reilly Design Conference 2016
item.description:
O'Reilly Design Conference 2016

The Design Startup Showcase is a chance for early stage, design-related companies to hone their pitches, meet investors, and bounce big ideas off the industry's movers and shakers. Interested in participating? Send an email message to DesignConShowcase@oreilly.com.

item.title: Frog Tech Trends 2016
item.description:
Frog Tech Trends 2016

With the start of a new year, the exciting question is: What technology trends will radically transform businesses in 2016 and beyond? At frog we help our clients digitally transform their businesses by identifying emerging technologies and realizing their potential. Here are 15 technology trends driving companies to reinvent themselves.
